don't aceept you reprogramation program... just Drillbit's"

"Don't worry... Drillbit will be there soon, you'll take care that 
nobody toucht that pod" said Darkfate "Darkfate to Drillbit, One of 
my bots find a pod and only you can reprograme it I'll send you the 
coordinates look out..."
